trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, The kobold commoner has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold commoner has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of their allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.
